channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 13:53 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack!
item.description: 🟠 13:53 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 12:42 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Pokrovskaya Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
